page.title: 20Amenities.
page.content: Checking Amenities, we found our area is very badly served. There are two public houses and one small corner shop just out of the area. Bus Stops are a good walk away. The GPO and other shops are a mile away downhill. There are no designated playing fields only the school field or farmland. There is a large park, about 1/2 mile away. It is served by a Junior and Infant School. Comprehensive Schools are 1.5 miles in either direction. Football Club, Tennis Club, 0.5 miles. Swimming, Squash 1.5 miles, as are Churches, Scouts, etc. The Hill makes it a laborious return walk. Cinema, Railway and Bus Station approx. 1.5miles distant.It is essentially a residential area. a car or two is necessary to take advantage of amenities outside the near locality.
